title: Isaac del Toro Unravels in Finestre Tactical Gamble: ‘I Just Did What I Thought Smartest’
content:
Del Toro slides to second overall at Giro d'Italia after Simon Yates forces rivals into high-stakes game of poker on the gravel of Colle delle Finestre.

Read the full article at Isaac del Toro Unravels in Finestre Tactical Gamble: ‘I Just Did What I Thought Smartest’ on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
